headerDisplay: homebridge-blinds-cmd is a [Homebridge](https://homebridge.io) plugin that allows you to raise or lower your window blinds by executing a given command line script.
footerDisplay: For additional help please see the [developer page](https://github.com/hjdhjd/homebridge-blinds-cmd).

name.title: Blind Name
name.description: Name you want to assign to the blind you want to control.

up_cmd.title: Up Command Script
up_cmd.description: Path to the command or script to raise the blind.

down_cmd.title: Down Command Script
down_cmd.description: Path to the command or script to lower the blind.

state_cmd.title: State Command Script
state_cmd.description: Path to the command or script to show the current state of the blind.
